extension.description.short.message: PreMiD adds Discord Rich Presence integration, media controls and much more to your beloved services.

extension.description.full.message:
Your Rich Presence for web services!
PreMiD is a small utility that allows you to show what you are doing on websites in your Discord profile using Discord’s Rich Presence SDK. When you start watching a video for example the extension grabs all the information needed from the page and sends it over to our application to set the status in your Discord profile.


PreMiD supports more than 250 websites and still going thanks to its strong community that add new Presences every day.

To use PreMiD you need to add this extension and install the official PreMiD application found on our website. This is due to constraints in the way Discord’s Rich Presence SDK works.
